name: embracingly

embracingly adverb
(INCLUDING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that includes many, most, or all people or things: Even the most embracingly inclusive empires eventually collapse. He waved his hand embracingly to include the whole room.
More examplesFewer examplesHe's a gifted actor with an embracingly effervescent personality.Overall, the play is enjoyable and embracingly comic, appealing to a diverse audience.
